item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, November 11, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Who’s who in the Musk ‘A-team’ vying to shape Trump 2.0
2. Deutsche’s private bank fires over 100 senior bankers in cost-cutting drive

5. Bitcoin hits record high as Republicans edge closer to full control of Congress
